pfam_sequences module¶

pfam_sequences.clan_members(clans)¶

This function return the dictionary of pfam families belonging to the clans

Parameters

clans – list or string with the name of the clan

Returns

Ditionary of clan name as key and clan members as value

Return type

dict

pfam_sequences.family_seq(families, form='fasta', type='full', download=False, path=None)¶

This function search for sequences of the family in format and form specified by the user.

Parameters

  • families (str or list) – Id or accession of the family, or list of the families names

  • form (str, optional) – Output format of ssequences. Available: fasta, selex, stockholm, msf, defaults to fasta

  • type (str, optional) – A type of the sequences from the fmaily site. Available: full, seed, defaults to full

  • download (bool optional) – ‘True’ if download to the file, defaults to False

  • path (str, optional) – path to the outpur file if download is True

Returns

List of SeqIO type objects

Return type

list

pfam_sequences.family_tree(families, download=False, path=None)¶

This function search for phylogenetic tree of the family in the Newick format.

Parameters

  • families (str or list) – Id or accession of the family, or list of the families names

  • download (bool optional) – ‘True’ if download to the file, defaults to False

  • path (str, optional) – path to the outpur file if download is True

Returns

List of PhyloIO type objects

Return type

list

pfam_sequences.get_alternative(families)¶

This function give alternative name for the family - for id it gves accession, for accession - gives id.

Parameters

families (str or list) – Id or accession of the family

Returns

Dictionary with the accession as key and id as value

Return type

dict

pfam_sequences.go_terms(family)¶

This function give go terms connected to the pfam family

Parameters

families (str) – Id or accession of the family

Returns

Set of go terms

Return type

set
